Title: 37705 - # Tips to Keep Your Finances In Check
Direction: 500 words: List 3-6 tips for managing your personal finances. Many people ignore certain easy ways to maintain healthy finances. Discuss some basic ways to maintain the balance of personal/household finances. You can place the client link by mentioning the site as another resource for financial advice. Your target audience is adults that are knowledgeable and stay current on financial subjects.
